item.title: MAKE Bank Bankers && Booth Work [{ PLZ HELP}]
item.dc:creator: @Kitno Kitno
item.description:
@Kitno wrote:

Go into client.java and search

second Click npc

You should see

case 17: //second Click npc

Now search

aubury

You should see

} else if (NPCID == 553) { //Aubury rune shop PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 2; //Aubury Magic Shop } else if (NPCID == 522 || NPCID == 523) { //Shop Keeper + Assistant PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 1; //Varrock General Store } else if (NPCID == 526 || NPCID == 527) { //Shop Keeper + Assistant PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 3; //Falador General Store

If you cant find the first thing (Second option npc) then just search aubury til you find that ^^

Now add this in it

} else if (NPCID == xxxx || NPCID == xxxx) { //bankers with bank option openUpBank(); }

Replace the xxxx with the NPC id of the bankers. Add more NPCIDs with it if you need to.

Read full topic

item.source: MAKE Bank Bankers && Booth Work [{ PLZ HELP}]

item.title: MAKE Bank Bankers && Booth Work [{ PLZ HELP}]
item.dc:creator: @Kitno Kitno
item.description:
@Kitno wrote:

The bank option is the 2nd option on NPCs. So find the case that supports second option NPCs (it would be shops) and add

if (NPCID == xxxx) { openUpBank(); }

make sure you have the void openUpBank or the void thats used to open your bank. You can do the same thing for NPCs with first click. And replace the XXXX with the NPC id. Make sure they have a bank option.

Read full topic
